name: Mr. Driller: Drill Land
overview: The popular action puzzle game "Mr. DRILLER DrillLand" makes its Western debut! You're invited to a secret amusement park known as "DrillLand" 500 meters underground! Explore and conquer the five "attractions" with simple, yet exciting, gameplay that guests of all ages can enjoy! Each of the five attractions in DrillLand features their own set of unique gameplay rules. Can you dig your way through each attraction and defeat the final boss?! Play with up to 4 players on one console - race to the finish or battle it out in "Free-for-All" or "Pairs"!
